summary: The code starts a container using Podman, but it may fail due to missing image. It runs busybox in read-only mode with limited CPU and memory allocation.

details.comment: The code starts a container using Podman, but it may fail due to missing image. It runs busybox in read-only mode with limited CPU and memory allocation.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
# use podman? but we have not had the image!
podman run --rm --read-only -ti --cpus 0.01 --memory 2m localhost/busybox
# t -> visual
# i -> communication
